name: part_007
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】歌に謎解きにホラーあり！？こよりらしさを詰め込んだライブ！ - THE KOYORI - 【 #博衣こより1周年 ⧸ホロライブ】 [aLgQxWOWEnw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: MC section after the song, talking about the performance and Koyori's anniversary outfit.

subtitles.original: 何にも頼りゃしないと
subtitles.english: Without relying on anything...

subtitles.original: 開いた指の隙間から
subtitles.english: Through the gaps between my open fingers...

subtitles.original: いつか手にしたままの
subtitles.english: Still holding onto what I once gained...

subtitles.original: 夢や憧れの種が
subtitles.english: The seeds of my dreams and aspirations...

subtitles.original: 僕にだけ気付いて欲しそうに
subtitles.english: Seemingly wanting only me to notice them,

subtitles.original: 明日へと芽吹出してる
subtitles.english: they're sprouting towards tomorrow.

subtitles.original: 逃げ出した昨日より
subtitles.english: Rather than the yesterday I fled from,

subtitles.original: ぶつかりあった今日にこぼした涙
subtitles.english: the tears I shed today after clashing...

subtitles.original: 立ち止まった自分を連れて
subtitles.english: Bringing along the self that came to a halt,

subtitles.original: あの日の僕に会いに行こうか
subtitles.english: shall I go meet the me from that day?

subtitles.original: 曲がりくねった道の先に
subtitles.english: At the end of the winding road,

subtitles.original: 幾つもの小さな光
subtitles.english: there are many small lights,

subtitles.original: まだ遠くて見えなくても
subtitles.english: even if they're still far away and invisible.

subtitles.original: 一歩ずつ　ただそれだけを
subtitles.english: Step by step, just that alone...

subtitles.original: 正しさという狭い出口を
subtitles.english: Through the narrow exit called 'correctness',

subtitles.original: くぐれない想いが僕を奮い立たせる
subtitles.english: feelings that can't pass through rouse me.

subtitles.original: 振り返ればただ真っ直ぐに
subtitles.english: Looking back, stretching out straight,

subtitles.original: 伸びていた今日までを辿る足跡
subtitles.english: footsteps that trace my path up to today.

subtitles.original: 曲がりくねった道の先に
subtitles.english: At the end of the winding road,

subtitles.original: 夢見てたあの日の僕が
subtitles.english: the me who was dreaming that day

subtitles.original: 待っているから
subtitles.english: is waiting for me.

subtitles.original: やったー！
subtitles.english: We did it!

subtitles.original: かなた先輩、フレア先輩、来てくれてありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Kanata-senpai, Flare-senpai, thank you so much for coming!

subtitles.original: いえーい！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: こよりちゃーん！
subtitles.english: Koyori-chaaan!

subtitles.original: はい！はい！何、何何？
subtitles.english: Yes! Yes! What is it?

subtitles.original: 衣装…なんかぬるぬるしてる。
subtitles.english: Your outfit... feels kind of slimy.

subtitles.original: あ、ありがとうございます！何キャラ？
subtitles.english: Ah, thank you! Wait, what character are you playing?

subtitles.original: おめでたーい！めでたい！
subtitles.english: Congratulations! It's worth celebrating!

subtitles.original: ちょっと、あの、3人揃ったんで、あの…
subtitles.english: Since the three of us are together, I wanted to...

subtitles.original: 「かなりあぜ！」って言いたい、いい？
subtitles.english: say "Kanaria-ze!", okay?

subtitles.original: お、やっちゃおう、やっちゃおう！
subtitles.english: Oh, let's do it, let's do it!

subtitles.original: せーの！
subtitles.english: One, two...

subtitles.original: かなりあぜー！！
subtitles.english: Kanaria-ze!!

subtitles.original: やったー！やったー！
subtitles.english: Yay! We did it!

subtitles.original: え、この衣装可愛いね。
subtitles.english: Hey, this outfit is so cute.

subtitles.original: あ、そう！可愛いでしょ！えへへ、お披露目してきました。
subtitles.english: Right? Isn't it cute! Ehehe, I just revealed it.

subtitles.original: 可愛い！え、ちょっと触っちゃおう。おー、触り心地いいな。
subtitles.english: Cute! Hey, let me touch it. Oh, it feels nice.

subtitles.original: ちょっ、後ろの尻尾も見たい！
subtitles.english: Wait, I want to see the tail in the back too!

subtitles.original: 見たい、見たい！え、めっちゃ可愛い！ちょっと可愛い、このリボンから生えてるみたいな。
subtitles.english: I want to see! Whoa, it's so cute! So cute, it looks like it's growing from this ribbon.

subtitles.original: 可愛い！後ろ、みんなで見たい、あ、見づらいけど後ろ…
subtitles.english: So cute! I want everyone to see the back. Ah, it's hard to see, but the back...

subtitles.original: そうなんです、フルカラーなんです！
subtitles.english: That's right, it's in full color!

subtitles.original: えへへ、色味の組み合わせいいよね。
subtitles.english: Ehehe, the color combination is great, isn't it?

subtitles.original: え、このさ、曲をさ、あのかなりあで歌いたいなと思った理由とかあったりする？
subtitles.english: So, was there a reason why you wanted to sing this song as "Kanaria"?

subtitles.original: あ、聞きたい、聞きたい！
subtitles.english: Oh, I want to know too!

subtitles.original: あの、実はこより、小さい頃からあの、自分のコブクロになってくれる人を探してたんですよ。
subtitles.english: Actually, since I was little, I've been looking for people who would be my "Kobukuro".

subtitles.original: え？どういうこと？ちょっと待って。
subtitles.english: Wait, what? What do you mean?

subtitles.original: どういうこと？どういうこと、コブクロを探してた？
subtitles.english: What do you mean? You were looking for a Kobukuro?

subtitles.original: あの、この曲すごい好きで、あの、コブクロになってくれる人いないと、一人でね全部歌わなきゃいけなくなっちゃうんで。
subtitles.english: I love this song so much, but without someone to be my "Kobukuro", I'd have to sing all the parts myself.

subtitles.original: 意味がわかんない、意味わかんないんだよ。
subtitles.english: I don't get it. I really don't get it.

subtitles.original: コブク…あ、僕たちがコブクロということ？
subtitles.english: Kobu... Oh, so you mean we're your "Kobukuro"?

subtitles.original: そう、あの絢香さん、コブクロさん。あ、なるほどね、へー。
subtitles.english: Yes, like Ayaka-san and Kobukuro-san. Ah, I see, okay.

subtitles.original: コブクロさんということで、じゃあ僕たち二人で組んでいきますかね、これからも、かなりあで。
subtitles.english: So as your Kobukuro, the two of us will be working together from now on as "Kanaria".

subtitles.original: よろしくお願いします！えへへ、ここでまたかなりあで。
subtitles.english: Looking forward to it! Ehehe, here we are as "Kanaria" again.

subtitles.original: あ、かなりあで写真撮ろうよ！撮りたい、撮りたい！
subtitles.english: Oh, let's take a photo as "Kanaria"! I want to, I want to!

subtitles.original: あの、前にこうやって、あの、こっちを背景に撮って撮って。
subtitles.english: Let's stand in front like this and take one with this as the background.
